dimension:
18 3/8 x 14 in. (46.67 x 35.56 cm) (sheet, irregular)
29 x 23 in. (73.66 x 58.42 cm) (outer frame)
title: Vertumnus and Pomona
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

See signed at R, in black: [Robertus de Baudous excud,/ A. Bl
description: woman and man seated at base of tree at center; woman unclothed; man masquerading as old woman with long dress and head wrap; figures surrounded by vegetation abundant with fruit, including, grapes, apples, pumpkins, cabbages and squash, among other flora; two figures embrace in background to R of man; pointing figure in background to L of center; four columns of text with 5 lines each at bottom of page; mated behind glass in brown wood frame
creditline: Gift of Albert, Clytie, and Ames Sheldon
